scripts.docker:clean: npm run docker:clean:containers && npm run docker:clean:images
scripts.docker:clean:containers: docker stop $(docker ps -a -q) && docker rm $(docker ps -a -q)
scripts.docker:login: aws ecr get-login-password --region us-east-1 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin 306057522130.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com
